titleStmt.title: An elegie sacred to the memory of Sir Edmund-bury Godfrey Knight whose body was lately found barbarously murthered, and since honourably interr'd, the 31th of October, 1678.
titleStmt.author: Care, Henry, 1646-1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Langley Curtis in Goat-Court on Ludgate hill,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end H.C. [i.e. Henry Care].
Verse - "An elegie! forbear: who ere profanes".
At end of text: Licens'd, Octob. 30. 1678.
Reproduction of the originals in: British Library; William Andrews Clark Memorial Library.
